title: How to Make a District 1 Family (Hunger Games) in Sims 3

steps.headline: Make a Sim family with a last name that indicates a precious metal (remember, District 1 is the jewelry-making district).
steps.description: Some ideas are Gold, Goldberg, Goldwater, Silver, or Copper. All members of this family must be athletic and toned, as District 1 trains people for the Hunger Games. All athletic outfits must be camouflage colors (for the Hunger Games arena).

steps.headline: Make a male Adult Sim for the father and give him a name from the list at http://nameberry.com/list/179/Mineral--Metal-Baby-Names.
steps.description: Give him either blond or red hair. Facial hair is up for grabs. Dress him in clothes that would fit the district. Use the traits Family-Oriented, Athletic, Loves the Outdoors, Artistic and Brave.

steps.headline: Make a female Adult Sim for the mother and give her a gem name (Opal, Pearl, Crystal or other such names).
steps.description: Give her an elaborate hairstyle, and use the flashiest jewelry you can get. Give her a dress as her everyday outfit. Use the traits Family-Oriented, Athletic, Artistic, Neat and another of your choice.

steps.headline: Make a female Teen Sim for the tribute and give her another gem name.
steps.description: She, too, must have an elaborate hairstyle and the flashiest jewelry possible. Use subdued makeup (think Glimmer). Think what a District 1 tribute would wear to the Tribute Parade, and imitate that for her everyday outfit. Use the traits Athletic, Artistic, Snob (because she would be a Career Tribute) and either Mean Spirited or Evil.

steps.headline: Move this family into a very luxurious house.
steps.description: Remember, District 1 is the richest district, being right next to the Capitol. You may need to use "motherlode" several times for this.

steps.headline: Put every possible treadmill, sports ball, jewelry-related object and exercise equipment around the house and the yard.
Delete all fishbowls.
steps.description: This would be more District 4 than District 1.

steps.headline: Upgrade all fridges, stoves, and showers to the most expensive ones.
Get the father and the mother jobs in the Business career track.
steps.description:
A District 1 adult would be a businessperson making and selling jewelry and other luxury items. As an alternative, you can choose the Professional Sports career track. steps.description: This enables them to cook rich foods.
